sections.heading: condition, defined.Emergency condition shall mean any condition which constitutes a clear and present danger to life, health, or property or which demands immediate action to prevent or repair a major service outage

sections.text:
76-2307.Emergency condition, defined.

Emergency condition shall mean any condition which constitutes a clear and present danger to life, health, or property or which demands immediate action to prevent or repair a major service outage.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 421, ยง 7.
